headline: Here's How AMGN Benefits From FDA Nod to Uplizna in Myasthenia Gravis
summary: AMGN gains momentum as Uplizna wins FDA approval for generalized myasthenia gravis, adding a twice-yearly dosing option in a crowded autoimmune market.
